snippet.title: Crow Country - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing Crow Country, a new retro survival horror game for PS5 and PC. What if Resident Evil and Final Fantasy 7 came together into one game?

The year is 1990. Edward Crow has disappeared. The owner of 'Crow Country', he has not been seen since he unexpectedly shut down his park two years ago. The silence is broken when a mysterious young woman named Mara Forest ventures into the heart of the abandoned theme park in order to find him. Play the demo now!
